Class Ticket

java.lang.Object
com.example.theaterproject.Models.Ticket
public class Ticket extends Object
Represents a ticket for a movie screening in the theater project system.

A Ticket associates a movie, a specific screening, a purchase price, and the client who purchased it. This class ensures that all required information is valid upon creation.

  • Constructor Details

    • Ticket

      public Ticket(Movie pMovie, Screening pScreening, double pPrice, Client pClient)
      Creates a new Ticket with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      pMovie - the movie for this ticket; must not be null
      pScreening - the screening for this ticket; must not be null
      pPrice - the price of the ticket; must be zero or positive
      pClient - the client purchasing the ticket; must not be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if any parameter is invalid
